item.title: Watching containers with Portainer and Sysdig
item.description: [screen capture: csysdig running inside Portainer] Run @sysdig CLI tool "csysdig" inside of a @portainerio console window. Nice way to watch @docker and @coreos cc @mckartha pic.twitter.com/hJGiHuJwKs — Edward Vielmetti (@vielmetti) December 29, 2016 The question to be answered is how to manage Docker containers - not just how to get them running, but also how to poke inside them while they are running to see what they are doing and make sure that you can make sense of what is happening while you develop or run in production.
